Uses of Class
A4.Book

  • Uses of Book in A4

    Methods in A4 with parameters of type Book
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    BookList.addToStart(Book b)
    The addToStart method adds a new Node at the front of a linked list which holds the book object passed in the method.
    boolean
    Book.equals(Book b)
    The equals method checks if the book object given has the same attributes as the object which called it.
    boolean
    BookList.insertBefore(long isbn, Book b)
    the insertBefore method takes an ISBN value and inserts a Book object before the book which matches the ISBN value.
    boolean
    BookList.insertBetween(long isbn1, long isbn2, Book b)
    The insertBetween takes 2 ISBN values and inserts a Book object between 2 books that match the ISBN values.

    Copy constructor which takes a book object and returns a copy of the object.
